intro: Caulinia prostrata, commonly known as the prostrate caulinia, is a low-growing herbaceous plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton plants. The plant features small, green, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are typically pale yellow or greenish-white, with five petals and a prominent central stigma. Caulinia prostrata is often found in moist, shaded environments and is adapted to thrive in tropical and subtropical regions.
